course_description: The course focuses on various approaches used in solving finite and infinite horizon dynamic optimization problems frequently encountered in economics. These approaches include calculus of variation, dynamic programming, and optimal control.
schedule_location:
MWF 8am-11am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
MWF 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rich Building 301
